text: Décines-Charpieu (), sometimes just called Décines, is a commune in the Lyon area of eastern France. It is part of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region. == Geography == Décines-Charpieu is close to the Grand Large reservoir. It is also close to (12 kilometres east of) Lyon. == Sports == The Parc Olympique Lyonnais stadium is located in Décines-Charpieu. It is the home stadium of Olympique Lyonnais. == References == Category:Communes in Rhône Category:Dauphins and Dauphines of France
title: Décines-Charpieu
